tags.name: ef-button
tags.description:
Use button for actions in forms, dialogs,
and more with support for different states and styles.

attributes.name: textpos
attributes.description:
Customises text alignment when specified alongside `icon` property
Value can be `before` or `after`

attributes.name: transparent
attributes.description: Removes background when specified alongside `icon` property

attributes.name: icon
attributes.description: Specify icon to display in button. Value can be icon name

attributes.name: hover-icon
attributes.description: Specify icon to display when hovering. Value can be icon name

attributes.name: toggles
attributes.description: Enable or disable ability to be toggled

attributes.name: active
attributes.description: An active or inactive state, can only be used with toggles property/attribute

properties.name: textpos
properties.description:
Customises text alignment when specified alongside `icon` property
Value can be `before` or `after`

properties.name: transparent
properties.description: Removes background when specified alongside `icon` property

properties.name: icon
properties.description: Specify icon to display in button. Value can be icon name

properties.name: hoverIcon
properties.description: Specify icon to display when hovering. Value can be icon name

properties.name: toggles
properties.description: Enable or disable ability to be toggled

properties.name: active
properties.description: An active or inactive state, can only be used with toggles property/attribute

events.name: active-changed
events.description: Dispatched on changing `active` property state by taping on button when property `toggles` is true.
